sentences.sentence: One reason is straightforward: on many trees, the leaves that are the reddest are those on the side of the tree which gets most sun.
sentences.translation: 有个原因很简单：在许多树上，最红的叶子是那些在树的一侧得到最多阳光的叶子。
使用你的颜色最红的唇膏。

sentences.sentence: Here is the reddest rose in all the world. You will wear it to-night next your heart.
sentences.translation: 这是全世界最红的一朵玫瑰。你今晚就把它戴在你的胸口上。
